item.title: Listen to the Latest ‘KFF Health News Minute’
item.description: The "KFF Health News Minute” brings original health care and health policy reporting from our newsroom to the airwaves each week.

item.title: Many Fear Federal Loan Caps Will Deter Aspiring Doctors and Worsen MD Shortage
item.description: Health care professionals fear that new caps on federal student lending, set to start in July, will put medical school out of reach for many who want ...

item.title: A Ticking Clock: How States Are Preparing for a Last-Minute Obamacare Deal

item.title: An Arm and a Leg: A Listener’s DIY Project Helps Others Deal With High Medical Bills
item.description: A medical student’s DIY project brings “An Arm and a Leg” listeners together with new tools to fight medical debt.

item.title: ¿Un auto nuevo o un seguro médico? La cobertura familiar a través del empleo cuesta a los trabajadores hasta $27.000
item.description: Hoy, el seguro médico para una familia cuesta más o menos lo mismo que comprar un Toyota Corolla híbrido nuevo.
